turns.speaker: customer
turns.text: Hi, my contactless payments stopped working today. The card chip still works but when I try to tap, nothing happens

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Hi there! I'm Alex, and I'll help you get your contactless payments working again. Could you tell me when you first noticed this issue and if you've tried the card at different stores? ğŸ¤”

turns.speaker: customer

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Thanks for those details! I can see your card ending in 4721 has been used at those locations today. Let's check a few things - have you recently activated a new card or made any changes in your app settings?

turns.speaker: customer

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Ah, that might be the cause! We've seen some cases where the latest app update temporarily affects contactless settings. Could you try this: 1) Go to Card Settings 2) Tap 'Security Features' 3) Toggle contactless payments off, wait 10 seconds, then back on
